description: This file defines a progressService object that provides various asynchronous methods to fetch user progress, summaries, admin KPIs, course completions, and progress distribution data, primarily interacting with a Supabase backend or fallback API endpoints.

methods.name: getUserProgress
methods.description: Fetches the current user's progress data, either from Supabase or via API fallback.

methods.name: getUserSummary
methods.description: Retrieves a summary of the user's enrollment and progress status.

methods.name: getAdminSummary
methods.description: Provides key performance indicators for admin dashboard, including total users, active users, total courses, and today's completions.

methods.name: getCourseCompletions
methods.description: Returns a list of courses with their respective completion counts.

methods.name: getProgressDistribution
methods.description: Provides distribution data of user progress percentages across predefined buckets.
